Game.Name: Sports Pad Soccer (Japan)
Game.plot: Get ready to play like a professional on this fast-paced soccer green. Your arena? It's international and you're up against the best soccer teams in the world. Will you play with Italian passion, Argentine stamina or the calculating cool of the West Germans? Maybe you'll want to push the young U.S.A. team to championship status. Your strategy: combine athletic skill and accurate timing to win points and block goals. And it won't be easy. Your opponents are tough and after the glory. So pass, dribble and kick your way to victory. You've got the ball, now run with it.Cheat: Stop every Penalty KickIt's very easy to stop any penalty kick when you are the goalkeeper. Simply PAUSE the Master System when the player shoots and you see where the ball will go. Then, prepare the D-pad, unpause the game and stop it.
